tweet: @honkelechinwogu This is threat to the nation and DSS Chiefs, Police Chiefs, NIA Chiefs, Armed forces Chiefs are all able to sleep in their houses tonight? Walahi we are joking in Nigeria. Buhari sleep well ooo. I'm waiting for your tenure to be over so we can review your book!

name: Proudly Nigerian
tweet: From an unbiased point of view Buhari won Atiku,  some of us did campaigns door to door and we know what he heard and saw, dont stay on social media and assume Buhari is hated, go out and hear things truth is yes some do not like  Buhari but they felt Atiku was not an option

name: Proudly Nigerian
tweet: Exactly, I dont like talking about this but I worked during election I know what I saw, truth is Atiku is a bad product plus he has never had any cult followership like Buhari

name: Proudly Nigerian
tweet: I hardly even know yoruba muslims supporting him, Buhari is a movement loved by everyone regardless of religion, I did campaign i know what I saw people with PVC genuinely like Buhari more than Atiku forget social media people

tweet: *Ground 1* The 2nd Respondent (Muhammadu Buhari) was not duly elected by majority of lawful votes cast at the election.   + *Duplication of voters register to deceive electorates*   + *Records of Massive Over-voting in about 11 States*
